text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Child respondent" means a person who:
in a petition filed in juvenile court, is alleged to have committed a delinquent act; or
has committed a delinquent act.
"Delinquent act" has the meaning stated in § 3-8A-01 of the Courts Article.

"Prosecuting attorney" means:
the State's Attorney;
the State's Attorney's designee; or
when performing a prosecutorial function at the trial level, the Attorney General or the Attorney General's designee.
